name: alack
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of sadness or disappointment, especially when there is no hope that a situation will change: Alack, this proposal is doomed to failure. alas and alack (also alack and alas)
an expression of great sadness or disappointment: Alas and alack, he will not help me.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesAlack, alack! Alack, yes!It's rather expensive, alack.
